name: fullstack-auth-app
description: Full-stack authentication app with Express and Next.js

scripts.build: bun run build:express-backend && bun run build:next-auth-frontend
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd express-backend && bun install && cd ../next-auth-frontend && bun install
scripts.lint: cd express-backend && bun run lint && cd ../next-auth-frontend && bun run lint
scripts.test: cd express-backend && bun test && cd ../next-auth-frontend && bun test
